Description: Glazed steatite shabti of Pediamenope with a lappet-wig, a carved face and ears, an incised collar, crossed hands in relief holding the two relief hoes, the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in eight(surviving) rows of incised Hieroglyphs extending almost around the whole body, the back of one arm is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket, the ankle and foot section is missing.
Condition: incomplete - ankle and foot section missing
